thread.title: We Choo-Choo-Choose You to Celebrate Valentine’s Day ‘The Simpsons’ Way!
thread.title_full: We Choo-Choo-Choose You to Celebrate Valentine’s Day ‘The Simpsons’ Way!

title: We Choo-Choo-Choose You to Celebrate Valentine’s Day ‘The Simpsons’ Way!
text: Superfan TV • February 14, 2017 Oh, what a perfectly cromulent day for love! It embiggens my heart to think of all the chocotastic gifts I have waiting for me at home … from my cat. Aww, Valentine’s Day can be the worst … unless you have T he Simpsons there to do the unpossible — skewer a greeting card company-fabricated holiday like the Feast of Saint Valentine! Over the past 300 or so seasons, The Simpsons has poked fun at Feb. 14 many a time, but it was 1993’s “I Love Lisa” that lampooned it the best. The episode introduced us to hands down our favorite bad Valentine’s puns ever, and it even helped us deal with the trials and tribulations of young love. But in the end, it was “Lisa’s Date With Density” that taught us there’s hope for all of us … even Milhouse. The Simpsons airs Sundays at 8 p.m. on Fox. ‘Family Guy’: 18 Years & Our 18 Favorite Offensive Jokes… Tell us what you think! W hat’s been your favorite Simpsons Valentine’s Day moment? And is it normal for a grown man to give himself chocolates and scented candles and pretend it’s from his cat? Hit us up on Twitter , Facebook , or Instagram or leave your comments below. And check out our host, Khail Anonymous, on Twitter .
